DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim : To place three commercially available resin composite Class II cavity preparation adult patient , evaluate resin composite restoration baseline , 6 month , 1 year , 2 3 year use specific criterion ( direct indirect ) .
DOC.criteria: must give write informed consent participate trial must need least three posterior dental filling replacement restoration due caries esthetic replacement without caries acceptable . must available require postoperative followup visit restoration must contact oppose natural crown teeth least least one occlusal contact habitual closure Class II restoration must least one proximal contact restoration must buccal lingual/palatal width great 1/3 distance buccal lingual/palatal cusp tip restoration must Class II proximal contact natural artificial tooth severe medical complication ( organ transplant , long term antibiotic steroid treatment , cancer immunocompromised ) disability may able tolerate time required complete restoration provide adequate oral hygiene xerostomia either take medication know produce xerostomia radiation induce Sjogren 's syndrome patient chronic periodontitis , rampant caries poor oral hygiene may require extraction teeth restore unavailable long term recall tolerate rubber dam require isolation tooth preparation restoration . meet inclusion criterion present systemic local disorder contraindicate dental procedure include study unstable occlusion severe bruxing clench need TMJ relate therapy teeth periapical pathology expect pulp exposure teeth nonvital exhibit sign pulpal pathology pregnant .
